name: AFGNobeliskDetonator
comment: Copyright 2016-2019 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: BeginPrimaryFire
methods.comment: Called on both client and server

methods.name: EndPrimaryFire
methods.comment: Called on both client and server

methods.name: GetChargePct
methods.comment: Return the current charge in percent

methods.name: SpawnExplosive
methods.comment: Executes on Server, Spawns and throws out a Nobelisk charge

methods.name: Server_SpawnExplosive
methods.comment: Called from client to Spawn Explosive on server

methods.name: StartDetonations
methods.comment: Called by Client or Server, sets the lifetime on explosives so that they boom after a duration

methods.name: ExecutePrimaryFire
methods.comment: Called by an anim notify to actually trigger the throwing of the explosive

methods.name: Server_ExecutePrimaryFire
methods.comment: Called by client to start throw on server.

methods.name: SecondaryFirePressed
methods.comment: Called when the player presses secondary fire

methods.name: OnSecondaryFirePressed
methods.comment: Call animation from blueprint that will contain notify to trigger actual detonation

methods.name: ExecuteSecondaryFire
methods.comment: Called by an anim notify to actually trigger the detonation sequence

methods.name: Server_ExecuteSecondaryFire
methods.comment: Called by client to start fire on server.

methods.name: OnViewportFocusChanged
methods.comment: Called from Hotbar status change, to indicate we have change SceneViewport Focus

properties.name: mExplosiveData
properties.comment: Explosive Data (Applied to the explosive projectile on spawn)

properties.name: mExplosiveClass
properties.comment: What types of bombs we should spawn

properties.name: mDispensedExplosives
properties.comment: Keeps track of the explosives we have dispensed

properties.name: mMaxChargeTime
properties.comment: If we charge the throw for this amount of time we will get max throw velocity

properties.name: mMaxThrowForce
properties.comment: If we charge the throw to the max we will throw with this force

properties.name: mMinThrowForce
properties.comment: If we tap the throw, this is the minimum force to throw with

properties.name: mDelayBetweenExplosions
properties.comment: When we blow shit up we want a small delay in between each explosion

properties.name: mPressTimestamp
properties.comment: The time when we press the fire button

properties.name: mPressReleaseTimestamp
properties.comment: The time when we released the fire button
